name: WW1 FUN WITH JAMES FőZ
description:
Welcome to WW1 FUN! 

A educational(?)  game made for a school assessment.  Here you will learn about history with Professor Főz, whether you like it or not. 

(note: contains mild coarse language, it is mostly censored ^^ this will be toned down in the final)

We would really appreciate it if you played our game! comments and suggestions are welcome.

This game is done for now, as a demo. but if people like it we will expand it!

This game is free to play! thank you!
